description: Change of use to sui generis use, comprising single family dwelling on ground, first and second floors and community use with public access in the basement, including associated internal and external alterations, the erection of an escape stair and small outbuilding, landscaping and replacement of the front boundary gates and railings.
decision_conditions: <p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;"><span style="font-size: 13.3333px;">Prior to the commencement of works, d</span>etailed drawings and full particulars of the following shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The works shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved:</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">A._ Details of the basement glazed doors in the form of 1:20 sections and elevation and 1:5 details&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">B. Details of proposed new windows in the form of 1:20 elevations and sections demonstrating the position of the window within the opening and 1:5 details.&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">C.&nbsp; Details of proposed materials for floors, particularly in the basement (following trial pits) and at second floor level.&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">D. A typical section of the proposed new internal walls showing materials at 1:5 scale&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">E.&nbsp; Details of the proposed refuse, recycling and cycle storage.&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">F. Full details of the landscaping proposals&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">G. A Schedule of Internal Works, laid out in tabular form and addressing the building room by room, detailing in brief the works to place to walls, ceilings, internal joinery and floors with the materials proposed; and details of all new and replacement internal joinery including doors, picture rails, skirting boards, dado rails and panelling, architraves etc. in the form of manufacturer's details and illustrations or appropriately scaled elevation and section drawings;&nbsp;</span></p><p><b style="font-weight:normal;" id="docs-internal-guid-1e371f1f-7fff-afb3-036a-6a177dbcb13a"><br></b></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the building </span></p><div><span style="font-size:10pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;"><br></span></div>

<p>Notwithstanding the details shown on the plans and documents hereby approved, full particulars of the proposed fire escape stairwell shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority prior to the commencement of works. The details shall include detail of the proposed mechanism to attach this to the building, detailed drawings, samples of the screening materials, is required. The works shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.</p><p>REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the building&nbsp;<br></p><div><br></div>

The Development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of Section 18(a) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 as amended.

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.
